sentences.sContent: Clearly, one of the objectives is to demoralize the enemy troops in any way they can.
sentences.sCn: 很清楚，目的之一是他们想尽一切办法瓦解敌军的士气。

synos.tran: 使道德败坏；使堕落；使士气低落

words.tran: 堕落；道德败坏；士气低落
使士气低落；使陷入混乱状态；使堕落（demoralize的过去分词）
使无斗志；使堕落（demoralize的ing形式）
使…道德败坏；使…士气低落；使…丧失信心（等于demoralize）

trans.tranCn: 使道德败坏；使堕落；使士气低落
trans.tranOther: If something demoralizes someone, it makes them lose so much confidence in what they are doing that they want to give up
